I didn’t come up with this genius admin mondays thing, btw, @jessicahische did. Or at least she’s how I found the idea. Either way, gr8.
Got a non-urgent thing that needs a thoughtful reply? I’ll look at it on Monday. Need a long-ish call? Sure, how about Monday afternoon?
No scheduled client work, just a day of accounts, catching up on emails you’d flagged to deal with later, planning, all that stuff.
Doing an admin monday for the first time in ages and it’s seriously the best thing u guys.
@RobThez You ABSOLUTELY should. Happy Birthday, Rob. My present is my permission.
